modName: Dx's Follower - Thoralf - SOS Support - DELETED
summary:
His name is Thoralf, he is an Breton from High Rock and the older brother of Fynn.
Thoralf is an trained Soldier, Vampire- and Bounty Hunter.
All my Followers have an Schlongs of Skyrim support.
